name: Bitcoin AI
description: Bitcoin AI is a decentralized cryptocurrency launched on August 18, 2025. It was designed to combine the proven security and scarcity principles of Bitcoin with the cutting-edge capabilities of artificial intelligence. Bitcoin AI operates as a peer-to-peer digital currency, enabling transactions directly between users without the need for intermediaries or centralized authorities. Its innovative integration of AI optimizes transaction efficiency, security, and adaptability, paving the way for a smarter and more autonomous financial ecosystem. While Bitcoin laid the foundation for decentralized digital money, Bitcoin AI represents the next evolutionâ€”empowering users with an intelligent, self-optimizing currency built for the future of finance.
